_header: At a place where he me set
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler TM 214; Ringler Jr. (1988)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse Printed 1476-1558. London: Mansell, 1988 TP 193.
_description: A carol of Hunting — three 5-line stanzas (aaabb) including refrain, ‘We shall have game and sport ynow’ plus burden: ‘As I walked by a forest side / I met with a foster he bad me abide’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
At a place where he me settHe bad me what tyme an hart I
                    met…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…With trororo trororo trororoHow we shall haue game &
                    sport ynowExplicit
